Sentencas: In order to promote the development and commercialization of different fuel cell technologies a national programme, coordinated by ENEA, was begun in 1985, with the collaboration of industries, utilities and research facilities.
Titulo: STATUS OF FUEL-CELL RESEARCH-AND-DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM AND PERSPECTIVES FOR COMMERCIALIZATION IN ITALY

Sentencas: In the framework of this programme, phosphoric acid fuel cell plants of different sizes and for different applications (from a few kW to 1 MW) will be built and tested; R&D activities are being carried out in the field of advanced fuel cells (molten carbonate, solid oxide, solid polymer) to develop cell and stack technology.
Titulo: STATUS OF FUEL-CELL RESEARCH-AND-DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM AND PERSPECTIVES FOR COMMERCIALIZATION IN ITALY

Sentencas: The status of programme activities, together with the perspectives for commercialization in Italy, are presented and described.
Titulo: STATUS OF FUEL-CELL RESEARCH-AND-DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM AND PERSPECTIVES FOR COMMERCIALIZATION IN ITALY
